citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30 on
08/03/2021. Arrived at facility, called contact phone number, knocked on door and honked the horn. No response.
Attempted to contact licensee at place of employment and was told licensee was on a trip with his family.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30 on 
08/03/2021.  Arrived at facility, called contact phone number, knocked on door and honked the horn.  No response.  
Attempted to contact licensee at place of employment and was told licensee was on a trip with his family. 
 
 
 
End Section
